items.title: How to prepare for your annual check-up
items.content: A short checklist to get the most out of your routine appointment...
items.author: DocliQ Editorial Team
items.keyTakeaway: Write down symptoms + medications before you go.

items.title: Flu season basics: when to see a doctor
items.content: Most flu cases can be managed at home, but watch for red flags...
items.author: Dr. Jonas Weber
items.keyTakeaway: Seek help for breathing trouble, dehydration, or symptoms >7 days.
